channel.title: Career on Jincheng Li
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Jincheng Li

item.title: Learnings from the Past Two Years
item.description: This used to be an unfinished rant/post from when I crashed into some free time in 2019. At the time I’ve been working at BigCo for a year, so I reflected on what I’ve learned a bit. Now, another year later, I’ve finally found the time to finish it. Opinions my own and does not represent those of my employer, etc etc. Company Culture I think most of the things people say about BigCo’s culture are true, but experiencing it helps me put them into perspective.
